text: Crown Prince Hyojang (; February 15, 1719 - November 16, 1728) is a member of the Joseon dynasty. His real name is Yi Haeng (). He is the first son of crown prince Yeongjo of Joseon.명당과 풍수 그리고 왕릉 Ohmynews 2004.09.24. He is the elder half-brother of Crown Prince Sado. He died when he was 9 years old. The cause is unknown. == References == Category:1719 births Category:1728 deaths Category:Korean princes and princesses
title: Crown Prince Hyojang
